title: Blogs to follow
body:
Just a simple list of blogs I find net-positive for myself and want to give credit where credit is due.

* [GoMakeThings (daily tips)](https://gomakethings.com/articles/)
* [From Cook to (great) Developer](https://www.taniarascia.com/)
* [Bartosz Ciechanowski (explaining topics with JS-animations)](https://ciechanow.ski/)
* [joshWcomeau](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/) (informative React knowledge)
* [Fï»¿lavio Copes](https://flaviocopes.com/)

Also some GitHub-repos worth knowing:

* [A bunch of custom hooks for React](https://github.com/streamich/react-use)
